segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink—water just pouring out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, oblivious, polishing that plate like it's the most important thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's getting bigger, soaking her shoes and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back— he's going to fall and break something!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, like this is all a fun game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They shouldn't be sneaking cookies like that; it's dishonest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That nice garden outside makes the mess inside even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it gets out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's paying attention to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
